sentences.en: Annals becomes: " I am mom, be father, also be a gentleman. "
sentences.cn: 志成道: “ 我就是妈妈, 不是爸爸, 也不是先生. ”

sentences.en: Happy are the people whose annals are tedious.
sentences.cn: 历史平淡乏味的人民是幸福的.

sentences.en: His deeds went down in the annals of British history.
sentences.cn: 他的事迹已载入英国史册。

sentences.en: His name will go down in the annals.
sentences.cn: 他的名字将载入编年史.

sentences.en: It can make the person breaks annals, be disloyal to lose life even.
sentences.cn: 它能使人失志 、 失节甚至失去生命.

sentences.en: It is the most unusual and spectacular thing in the Senate annals.
sentences.cn: 这在议会纪录里是最不寻常而绝妙的东西了.

sentences.en: It was published in the "Annals of Internal Medicine".
sentences.cn: 它发表在《内科医学年鉴》上。

sentences.en: Recurring themes are readily discernible in the annals of history.
sentences.cn: 在历史纪录上完全可以找到重复的主题.

sentences.en: the Annals of the Zoological Society
The new guidelines appear in the Annals of Internal Medicine.
sentences.cn: 这一新的指导方针刊登在国际医学记录中.

sentences.en: The study is published in journal Annals of Internal Medicine.
sentences.cn: 该研究发表在内科医学年报.

sentences.en: The study was published in the medical journal Annals of Internal Medicine.
sentences.cn: 研究刊登在医学杂志内科年鉴>>上.

sentences.en: The widespread destruction from this typhoon will be in the annals of the nation's history.
sentences.cn: 台风所造成的满目疮痍将被载入该国的史册里.

sentences.en: They committed such fascist atrocities as have been seldom known in the annals of international relations.
sentences.cn: 他们犯下了国际关系史上罕见的法西斯暴.

sentences.en: This was the greatest event in the annals of European integration.
sentences.cn: 这是欧洲统一史上最重大的事件.

sentences.en: We found the information in the annals of the society.
sentences.cn: 我们在那个学会的年报里找到了这一消息.

trans.tran_cn: 编年史，历史记载，（学会等的）活动年报
trans.tran_en: used in the titles of official records of events or activities
